alert.note: Alert for Custer; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 7:41PM CDT until June 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Custer County in western Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Hammon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Hammon, Butler, Foss Reservoir, and Stafford. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 55 and 57. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
